com.maxwellwheeler.plugins.tppets.storage

Class PlayerPetIndex

  • Object
    • PlayerPetIndex

  • public class PlayerPetIndex
extends Object
    An index of how many pets each player owns. Used for the limiting of tamed pets.
    Author:
    GatheringExp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PlayerPetIndex.RuleRestriction
      Enum representing the results of when a pet is attempting to be tamed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerPetIndex

        public PlayerPetIndex(TPPets thisPlugin,
                      int totalLimit,
                      int dogLimit,
                      int catLimit,
                      int birdLimit)
        General constructor, referencing the plugin instance, and pet limits from the config file.
        Parameters:
        thisPlugin - The TPPets instance.
        totalLimit - The limit of all pets owned.
        dogLimit - The limit of all dogs owned.
        catLimit - The limit of all cats owned.
        birdLimit - The limit of all birds owned.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpecificLimit

        public int getSpecificLimit(PetType.Pets pt)
        Gets the limit specific to a pet of type pt.
        Parameters:
        pt - The pet type limit to get
        Returns:
        An integer represneting the specific taming limit of pet type pt

        Parameters:

      • allowTame

        public PlayerPetIndex.RuleRestriction allowTame(AnimalTamer at,
                                                Location loc,
                                                PetType.Pets pt)
        Core functionality of this object. Determines if a player should be able to tame a given pet.
        Parameters:
        at - The animal tamer that is attempting to tame a pet
        loc - The location of the tamer, used in Vault's permission api
        pt - The type of the the pet being tamed.
        Returns:
        The ruling. It can be allowed, disallowed because of X, or unknown
